segments.text: How much is it to rent an economy car ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: ¥ 200 a day or ¥ 1200 a week , unlimited mileage .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Could I have one for tomorrow morning ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you have your driver's license ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good . Now just complete this form .
segments.speaker: S2
